meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Scott Brill Tara Curcio Rebecca Rider Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6578.

td.p: Scott Brill, a public library assistant from Shelton, Connecticut
Tara Curcio, a technical project manager from Medford, New Jersey
Rebecca Rider, an office supply sales assistant from Fresh Meadows, New York (whose 4-day cash winnings total $86,600)

tr.td: APRIL
SHOWERS
ENDS WITH DOUBLE E
NORTH CAROLINA
ALPHANUMERIC TERMS
1993: 20 YEARS AGO IN FILM

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
